name: Oriental Siam Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at this great resort for a week at the begining of Feburary.
reviews.title: Great Resort

description: The Oriental Siam Resort is situated within 15 minutes from the airport & city centre, only 5 minutes from the Arts & Crafts villages. There are many tourists attractions nearby such as hot springs, cave, Underground Ancient City, golf courses and sport activities for the thrill seekers. At The Oriental Siam Resort, our English speaking staff promise you an experience you will never forget.
